_comment: Template for Claude Desktop MCP server configuration. Copy this to your claude_desktop_config.json and update the paths.

env._comment: Optional environment variable overrides. Remove the leading underscore to enable.

production_binary._comment: Use pre-built binary instead of dotnet run

docker_postgres._comment: Connect to PostgreSQL running in Docker on different port

remote_ollama._comment: Connect to Ollama running on a remote server

custom_model._comment: Use a different LLM model for generation

_placeholders._comment: Replace these placeholders with actual values
_placeholders.${PLUGIN_PATH}: The absolute path to the csharp-compounding-docs plugin directory (e.g., /Users/username/csharp-compounding-docs or C:\Users\username\csharp-compounding-docs)

_setup_instructions: 1. Copy this file content to your Claude Desktop configuration:
2. Replace ${PLUGIN_PATH} with the actual path to the plugin directory
3. Remove the underscore prefix from environment variables you want to override
5. Restart Claude Desktop to load the MCP server
